solution_line_template: When Penny has her dog inside the canoe, only {capacity_fraction_with_dog}*{total_capacity} = <<{capacity_fraction_with_dog}*{total_capacity}={people_with_dog}>>{people_with_dog} people could fit inside the canoe.

If every person in a trip where Penny had her dog inside the canoe weighed {person_weight} pounds, the total weight of people inside the canoe was {person_weight}*{people_with_dog}= <<{person_weight}*{people_with_dog}={total_people_weight}>>{total_people_weight} pounds.
On the trip, the canoe was carrying {total_people_weight}+{dog_weight} = <<{total_people_weight}+{dog_weight}={total_canoe_weight}>>{total_canoe_weight} pounds
